mapper.insert: insert into logs (log_userId, log_state, log_date, log_award) values (#{logUserId}, #{logState},#{logDate},(select award from work_overtime where data=#{logDate}));
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(log_date,'%Y-%m-%d') log_date,log_userId,log_state,log_award,log_id from logs where log_userId = #{logUserId}
select DATE_FORMAT(data,'%Y-%m-%d') data,award,type from work_overtime where data=#{workDay}
